amendment.description: Page 7, after line 5, insert the following: (9) Article 10 of the Paris Agreement states that "Parties, noting the importance of technology for the implementation of mitigation and adaptation actions under this Agreement and recognizing existing technology deployment and dissemination efforts, shall strengthen cooperative action on technology development and transfer.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 116-42 to include findings that recognize the importance of clean energy technology development for the implementation of mitigation and adaptation actions of the agreements under the Paris Climate Accord.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 262 - 163 (Roll no. 178).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Porter.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 262 - 163 (Roll no. 178).
